  2: 
  3: /**
  4:  * Ce fichier est développé pour la gestion de la librairie Mélanie2
  5:  * Cette Librairie permet d'accèder aux données sans avoir à implémenter de couche SQL
  6:  * Des objets génériques vont permettre d'accèder et de mettre à jour les données
  7:  *
  8:  * ORM M2 Copyright © 2017  PNE Annuaire et Messagerie/MEDDE
  9:  *
 10:  * This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify
 11:  * it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by
 12:  * the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or
 13:  * (at your option) any later version.
 14:  *
 15:  * This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
 16:  * but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
 17:  * MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  See the
 18:  * GNU General Public License for more details.
 19:  *
 20:  * You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License
 21:  * along with this program.  If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.
 22:  */
 23: namespace LibMelanie\Sql;
 24: 
 25: use LibMelanie\Cache\Cache;
 26: use LibMelanie\Log\M2Log;
 27: use LibMelanie\Lib\Selaforme;
 28: use LibMelanie\Config\ConfigMelanie;
 29: use LibMelanie\Exceptions;
 30: 
 31: /**
 32:  * Gestion de la connexion Sql
 33:  *
 34:  * @author PNE Messagerie/Apitech
 35:  * @package Librairie Mélanie2
 36:  * @subpackage SQL
 37:  */
 38: class Sql {
 39:   /**
 40:    * Connexion PDO en cours
 41:    *
 42:    * @var PDO
 43:    */
 44:   private $connection = null;
 45:   /**
 46:    * String de connexion
 47:    *
 48:    * @var string
 49:    */
 50:   private $cnxstring;
 51:   /**
 52:    * Utilisateur SQL
 53:    *
 54:    * @var string
 55:    */
 56:   private $username;
 57:   /**
 58:    * Mot de passe SQL
 59:    *
 60:    * @var string
 61:    */
 62:   private $password;
 63:   /**
 64:    * Connexion persistante
 65:    *
 66:    * @var bool
 67:    */
 68:   private $persistent;
 69:   /**
 70:    * Connexion PDO en cours pour la lecture
 71:    *
 72:    * @var PDO
 73:    */
 74:   private $connection_read = null;
 75:   /**
 76:    * String de connexion pour la lecture
 77:    *
 78:    * @var string
 79:    */
 80:   private $cnxstring_read;
 81:   /**
 82:    * Utilisateur SQL pour la lecture
 83:    *
 84:    * @var string
 85:    */
 86:   private $username_read;
 87:   /**
 88:    * Mot de passe SQL pour la lecture
 89:    *
 90:    * @var string
 91:    */
 92:   private $password_read;
 93:   /**
 94:    * Connexion persistante pour la lecture
 95:    *
 96:    * @var bool
 97:    */
 98:   private $persistent_read;
 99:   /**
100:    * Mise en cache des statements par requete SQL
101:    * Voir MANTIS 3547: Réutiliser les prepare statements pour les requêtes identiques
102:    *
103:    * @var array
104:    */
105:   private $PreparedStatementCache;
106:   /**
107:    * Classe courante
108:    *
109:    * @var string
110:    */
111:   protected $get_class;
112:   /**
113:    * Resource vers les selaformes
114:    *
115:    * @var resource
116:    */
117:   private $ret_sel;
118:   /**
119:    * Derniere requete utilisee, sert pour les logs shutdown
120:    * 
121:    * @var string
122:    */
123:   private static $last_request;
124: 
125:   /**
126:    * Constructor SQL
127:    *
128:    * @param array $db configuration vers la base de données
129:    * @access public
130:    */
131:   public function __construct($db, $db_read = null) {
132:     // Défini la classe courante
133:     $this->get_class = get_class($this);
134: 
135:     M2Log::Log(M2Log::LEVEL_DEBUG, $this->get_class . "->__construct()");
136:     // Définition des données de connexion
137:     $this->cnxstring = "pgsql:dbname=$db[database];host=$db[hostspec];port=$db[port]";
138:     $this->username = $db['username'];
139:     $this->password = $db['password'];
140:     $this->persistent = $db['persistent'];
141:     // Définition des données de connexion pour la lecture
142:     if (isset($db_read)) {
143:       $this->cnxstring_read = "pgsql:dbname=$db_read[database];host=$db_read[hostspec];port=$db_read[port]";
144:       $this->username_read = $db_read['username'];
145:       $this->password_read = $db_read['password'];
146:       $this->persistent_read = $db_read['persistent'];
147:     }
148:     // Mise en cache des statements
149:     // MANTIS 3547: Réutiliser les prepare statements pour les requêtes identiques
150:     $this->PreparedStatementCache = [];
151:     $this->getConnection();
152:   }
153: 
154:   /**
155:    * Destructor SQL
156:    *
157:    * @access public
158:    */
159:   public function __destruct() {
160:     M2Log::Log(M2Log::LEVEL_DEBUG, $this->get_class . "->__destruct()");
161:     $this->disconnect();
162:   }
163: 
164:   /**
165:    * Connect to sql database
166:    *
167:    * @throws Melanie2DatabaseException
168:    *
169:    * @access private
170:    */
171:   private function connect() {
172:     M2Log::Log(M2Log::LEVEL_DEBUG, $this->get_class . "->connect()");
173:     // Utilisation des selaformes
174:     if (ConfigMelanie::SEL_ENABLED) {
175:       $this->ret_sel = Selaforme::selaforme_acquire(ConfigMelanie::SEL_MAX_ACQUIRE, ConfigMelanie::SEL_FILE_NAME);
176:       if ($this->ret_sel === false) {
177:         throw new Exceptions\Melanie2DatabaseException("Erreur de base de données Mélanie2 : Selaforme maximum atteint : " . ConfigMelanie::SEL_MAX_ACQUIRE, 11);
178:       }
179:     }
180:     // Connexion persistante ?
181:     $driver = [\PDO::ATTR_PERSISTENT => ($this->persistent == 'true'),\PDO::ATTR_ERRMODE => \PDO::ERRMODE_EXCEPTION];
182:     try {
183:       $this->connection = new \PDO($this->cnxstring, $this->username, $this->password, $driver);
184:     }
185:     catch (\PDOException $e) {
186:       // Erreur de connexion
187:       M2Log::Log(M2Log::LEVEL_ERROR, $this->get_class . "->connect(): Erreur de connexion à la base de données\n" . $e->getMessage());
188:       throw new Exceptions\Melanie2DatabaseException("Erreur de base de données Mélanie2 : Erreur de connexion", 21);
189:     }
190:     // Connexion à la base de données en lecture
191:     if (isset($this->cnxstring_read)) {
192:       // Connexion persistante ?
193:       $driver_read = [\PDO::ATTR_PERSISTENT => ($this->persistent_read == 'true'),\PDO::ATTR_ERRMODE => \PDO::ERRMODE_EXCEPTION];
194:       try {
195:         $this->connection_read = new \PDO($this->cnxstring_read, $this->username_read, $this->password_read, $driver_read);
196:       }
197:       catch (\PDOException $e) {
198:         // Erreur de connexion
199:         M2Log::Log(M2Log::LEVEL_ERROR, $this->get_class . "->connect(): Erreur de connexion à la base de données en lecture\n" . $e->getMessage());
200:         $this->connection_read = null;
201:       }
202:     }
203:     return true;
204:   }
205: 
206:   /**
207:    * Disconnect from SQL database
208:    *
209:    * @access public
210:    */
211:   public function disconnect() {
212:     M2Log::Log(M2Log::LEVEL_DEBUG, $this->get_class . "->disconnect()");
213:     // Fermer tous les statements
214:     $this->PreparedStatementCache = [];
215:     // Deconnexion de la bdd
216:     if (! is_null($this->connection)) {
217:       $this->connection = null;
218:       M2Log::Log(M2Log::LEVEL_DEBUG, $this->get_class . "->disconnect() Close connection");
219:     }
220:     // Deconnexion de la bdd pour la lecture
221:     if (! is_null($this->connection_read)) {
222:       $this->connection_read = null;
223:       M2Log::Log(M2Log::LEVEL_DEBUG, $this->get_class . "->disconnect() Close connection read");
224:     }
225:     // Utilisation des selaformes
226:     if (ConfigMelanie::SEL_ENABLED && $this->ret_sel !== false) {
227:       Selaforme::selaforme_release($this->ret_sel);
228:     }
229:   }
230: 
231:   /**
232:    * Get the active connection to the sql database
233:    *
234:    * @access private
235:    */
236:   public function getConnection() {
237:     // Si la connexion n'existe pas, on se connecte
238:     if (is_null($this->connection)) {
239:       if (! $this->connect()) {
240:         $this->connection = null;
241:       }
242:     }
243:   }
244: 
245:   /**
246:    * Execute a sql query to the active database connection in PDO
247:    * If query start by SELECT
248:    * return an array of array of data
249:    *
250:    * @param string $query
251:    * @param array $params
252:    * @param string $class
253:    * @param string $objectType
254:    * @param boolean $cached_statement Utiliser le cache pour les statements
255:    * @return mixed array de resultat, true
256:    * @throws Melanie2DatabaseException
257:    *
258:    * @access public
259:    */
260:   public function executeQuery($query, $params, $class, $objectType, $cached_statement = true) {
261:     M2Log::Log(M2Log::LEVEL_DEBUG, $this->get_class . "->executeQuery($query, $class)");
262:     M2Log::Log(M2Log::LEVEL_DEBUG, $this->get_class . "->executeQuery() params : " . print_r($params, true));
263:     // Sauvegarde de la derniere requete
264:     self::$last_request = ['query' => $query, 'params' => $params];
265:     // Si la connexion n'est pas instanciée
266:     if (is_null($this->connection)) {
267:       // Throw exception, erreur
268:       M2Log::Log(M2Log::LEVEL_ERROR, $this->get_class . "->executeQueryToObject(): Problème de connexion à la base de données");
269:       throw new Exceptions\Melanie2DatabaseException("Erreur de base de données Mélanie2 : Erreur de connexion", 21);
270:     }
271:     // Configuration de la réutilisation des prepares statements
272:     $cached_statement = $cached_statement & ConfigMelanie::REUSE_PREPARE_STATEMENT;
273:     // Si la requête demarre par SELECT on retourne les resultats
274:     // Sinon on retourne true (UPDATE/DELETE pas de resultat)
275:     // Récupération des données du cache
276:     if (strpos($query, "SELECT") === 0) {
277:       // Récupération du cache
278:       $cache = Cache::getFromSQLCache(null, is_array($params) ? array_keys($params) : $params, $query, $params);
279:       if (! is_null($cache) && $cache !== false) {
280:         return $cache;
281:       }
282:     }
283:     try {
284:       if ($cached_statement && isset($this->PreparedStatementCache[$query])) {
285:         // Récupérer le statement depuis le cache
286:         $sth = $this->PreparedStatementCache[$query];
287:       }
288:       else {
289:         // Choix de la connexion lecture/ecriture
290:         if (strpos($query, "SELECT") === 0 && ! is_null($this->connection_read) && ! $this->connection->inTransaction) {
291:           if (! isset($this->connection_read)) {
292:             return null;
293:           }
294:           $sth = $this->connection_read->prepare($query);
295:         }
296:         else {
297:           if (! isset($this->connection)) {
298:             return null;
299:           }
300:           $sth = $this->connection->prepare($query);
301:         }
302:         if ($cached_statement) {
303:           // Mise en cache du statement
304:           $this->PreparedStatementCache[$query] = $sth;
305:         }
306:       }
307:       if (isset($class))
308:         $sth->setFetchMode(\PDO::FETCH_CLASS, $class);
309:       else
310:         $sth->setFetchMode(\PDO::FETCH_BOTH);
311:       if (isset($params))
312:         $res = $sth->execute($params);
313:       else
314:         $res = $sth->execute();
315:     }
316:     catch (\PDOException $ex) {
317:       // Throw exception, erreur
318:       M2Log::Log(M2Log::LEVEL_ERROR, $this->get_class . "->executeQuery(): Exception $ex");
319:       throw new Exceptions\Melanie2DatabaseException("Erreur de base de données Mélanie2 : Erreur d'execution de la requête", 22);
320:     }
321:     // Tableau de stockage des données sql
322:     $arrayData = Array();
323:     // Si la requête demarre par SELECT on retourne les resultats
324:     // Sinon on retourne true (UPDATE/DELETE pas de resultat)
325:     if (strpos($query, "SELECT") === 0) {
326:       while ($object = $sth->fetch()) {
327:         if (isset($class) && method_exists($object, "pdoConstruct")) {
328:           if (isset($objectType))
329:             $object->pdoConstruct(true, $objectType);
330:           else
331:             $object->pdoConstruct(true);
332:         }
333:         $arrayData[] = $object;
334:       }
335:       Cache::setSQLToCache(null, is_array($params) ? array_keys($params) : $params, $query, $params, $arrayData);
336:       $sth->closeCursor();
337:       return $arrayData;
338:     }
339:     else {
340:       // Suppression dans le cache
341:       Cache::deleteFromSQLCache(null, null, $query);
342:       // Retourne le resultat de l'execution
343:       return $res;
344:     }
345:     // Retourne null, pas de resultat
346:     return false;
347:   }
348: 
349:   /**
350:    * Execute a sql query to the active database connection in PDO
351:    * If query start by SELECT
352:    *
353:    * @param string $query
354:    * @param array $params
355:    * @param mixed $object
356:    * @param boolean $cached_statement Utiliser le cache pour les statements
357:    * @return boolean
358:    *
359:    * @throws Melanie2DatabaseException
360:    *
361:    * @access public
362:    */
363:   public function executeQueryToObject($query, $params, $object, $cached_statement = true) {
364:     M2Log::Log(M2Log::LEVEL_DEBUG, $this->get_class . "->executeQueryToObject($query, " . get_class($object) . ")");
365:     M2Log::Log(M2Log::LEVEL_DEBUG, $this->get_class . "->executeQueryToObject() params : " . print_r($params, true));
366:     // Sauvegarde de la derniere requete
367:     self::$last_request = ['query' => $query, 'params' => $params];
368:     // Si la connexion n'est pas instanciée
369:     if (is_null($this->connection)) {
370:       // Throw exception, erreur
371:       M2Log::Log(M2Log::LEVEL_ERROR, $this->get_class . "->executeQueryToObject(): Problème de connexion à la base de données");
372:       throw new Exceptions\Melanie2DatabaseException("Erreur de base de données Mélanie2 : Erreur de connexion", 21);
373:     }
374:     // Configuration de la réutilisation des prepares statements
375:     $cached_statement = $cached_statement & ConfigMelanie::REUSE_PREPARE_STATEMENT;
376:     // Si la requête demarre par SELECT on retourne les resultats
377:     // Sinon on retourne null (UPDATE/DELETE pas de resultat)
378:     // Récupération des données du cache
379:     if (strpos($query, "SELECT") == 0) {
380:       // Récupération du cache
381:       $cache = Cache::getFromSQLCache(null, is_array($params) ? array_keys($params) : $params, $query, $params, $object);
382:       if (! is_null($cache) && $cache !== false) {
383:         if (method_exists($object, "__copy_from")) {
384:           if ($object->__copy_from($cache)) {
385:             return true;
386:           }
387:         }
388:       }
389:     }
390:     try {
391:       if ($cached_statement && isset($this->PreparedStatementCache[$query])) {
392:         // Récupérer le statement depuis le cache
393:         $sth = $this->PreparedStatementCache[$query];
394:       }
395:       else {
396:         // Choix de la connexion lecture/ecriture
397:         if (strpos($query, "SELECT") === 0 && ! is_null($this->connection_read) && ! $this->connection->inTransaction) {
398:           if (! isset($this->connection_read)) {
399:             return false;
400:           }
401:           $sth = $this->connection_read->prepare($query);
402:         }
403:         else {
404:           if (! isset($this->connection)) {
405:             return false;
406:           }
407:           $sth = $this->connection->prepare($query);
408:         }
409:         if ($cached_statement) {
410:           // Mise en cache du statement
411:           $this->PreparedStatementCache[$query] = $sth;
412:         }
413:       }
414:       $sth->setFetchMode(\PDO::FETCH_INTO, $object);
415:       if (isset($params))
416:         $res = $sth->execute($params);
417:       else
418:         $res = $sth->execute();
419:     }
420:     catch (\PDOException $ex) {
421:       // Throw exception, erreur
422:       M2Log::Log(M2Log::LEVEL_ERROR, $this->get_class . "->executeQueryToObject(): Exception $ex");
423:       throw new Exceptions\Melanie2DatabaseException("Erreur de base de données Mélanie2 : Erreur d'execution de la requête", 23);
424:     }
425:     // Si la requête demarre par SELECT on retourne les resultats
426:     // Sinon on retourne null (UPDATE/DELETE pas de resultat)
427:     if (strpos($query, "SELECT") == 0) {
428:       if ($sth->fetch(\PDO::FETCH_INTO)) {
429:         Cache::setSQLToCache(null, is_array($params) ? array_keys($params) : $params, $query, $params, $object);
430:         $sth->closeCursor();
431:         // Retourne true, l'objet est trouvé
432:         return true;
433:       }
434:       else {
435:         // Retourne false, l'objet n'est pas trouvé
436:         return false;
437:       }
438:     }
439:     else {
440:       // Suppression dans le cache
441:       Cache::deleteFromSQLCache(null, null, $query);
442:       return $res;
443:     }
444:     // Retourne null, pas de resultat
445:     return false;
446:   }
447: 
448:   /**
449:    * Begin a PDO transaction
450:    */
451:   public function beginTransaction() {
452:     M2Log::Log(M2Log::LEVEL_DEBUG, $this->get_class . "->beginTransaction()");
453:     $this->connection->beginTransaction();
454:   }
455: 
456:   /**
457:    * Commit a PDO transaction
458:    */
459:   public function commit() {
460:     M2Log::Log(M2Log::LEVEL_DEBUG, $this->get_class . "->commit()");
461:     $this->connection->commit();
462:   }
463: 
464:   /**
465:    * Rollback a PDO transaction
466:    */
467:   public function rollBack() {
468:     M2Log::Log(M2Log::LEVEL_DEBUG, $this->get_class . "->rollBack()");
469:     $this->connection->rollBack();
470:   }
471:   /**
472:    * Retourne la derniere requete
473:    * @return string
474:    */
475:   public static function getLastRequest() {
476:     M2Log::Log(M2Log::LEVEL_DEBUG, "Sql::getLastRequest()");
477:     return self::$last_request;
478:   }
479: }
